'I just can't believe Sara's really quitting!'%K%P
'Yeah, I know...'%K%P
I nodded in agreement.%K%P
We'd just watched them announce the audition's\npreliminary results.%K%P
We couldn't hide our surprise when\nSara suddenly announced her retirement plans, too.%K%P
People all over TV and the net\nwere showing the same shock.%K%P
'I wonder what happened with her...'%K%P
'She's in L☆SEVEN, she's even the center,\nwhat could make her quit all of a sudden...?'%K%P
Shuri seemed to be taking it particularly hard.\nShe looked so unhappy thinking about Sara.%K%P
But of course that was only natural.%K%P
A role model, someone she had aspired to be,\nwas leaving that very stage.%K%P
'Yeah... I can't really understand it,\nbut I'm sure Sara has her reasons.'%K%P
'And it won't do any good\nto keep worrying about it, right?'%K%P
As for Kagura, while she was surprised,\nit didn't look like she was in real shock.%K%P
She was talking like her usual, cheerful self.\nShe went her own way, and always stayed positive.%K%P
'...I just can't think the way you do, Kagura.'%K%P
'Oh... Really? Well, I guess I can\nunderstand why it bothers you.'%K%P
'You really seemed to look up to her.'%K%P
'That's right... I wanted to be like her...'%K%P
'Well then, I guess you'd better buckle down\nand pass the audition.'%K%P
'What do you mean?'%K%P
Shuri was looking at me, apparently confused.%K%P
'Well, if you become a member of L☆SEVEN,\nthen you can find out why Sara quit,\nand maybe come to understand her feelings more.'%K%P
'Oh, hey, you're right!\nYamato, sometimes you say the best stuff!'%K%P
'Or will you quit trying to become an\nidol because of this, Shuri?'%K%P
'As if! Becoming an idol is my dream!\nThis stuff with Sara doesn't change that.'%K%P
Shuri looked at me with resolve in her eyes.%K%P
'Yeah, that's the spirit!\nIf I lost my rival, I'd lose my drive, too!'%K%P
'Exactly. I could never let you win\nwithout even trying.'%K%P
'Remember, it's not like I'm going to just\nroll over and give up!'%K%P
Somehow, Shuri had come back from her shock.%K%P
As their supporter throughout the qualifier,\nI wanted them both to keep doing their best.%K%P
'Just remember, the bar is going to be\na lot higher to pass the audition.\nYou've got to be ready for that.'%K%P
'I know.\nOf course it's going to be harder.'%K%P
'Yeah, I'm sure you do, but actually\nI think Sara's announcement changes things a bit.'%K%P
'How so?'%K%P
'Well, I doubt Sara intended it, but I imagine\nthat this will result in the new member being\nlooked at as her replacement, right?' %K%P
Shuri seemed to understand what I was trying to say,\nand let out a small sigh.%K%P
'That means this audition is going to be getting\na whole of lot attention.'%K%P
'And so the judging is going to be\nthat much more strict.'%K%P
'Yep, exactly.'%K%P
'Mmhmm, I see.'%K%P
'Do you really?'%K%P
Shuri asked Kagura,\nwho was nodding sagely.%K%P
'Of course!\nIt means it's going to be, you know, tough!'%K%P
'Yeah, well... Okay, something like that.'%K%P
Oh, I guess Shuri gave up trying to explain!%K%P
But actually, for Kagura,\nit likely didn't matter much one way or the other.%K%P
She just liked making everyone happy,\nand did it the way she wanted.%K%P
That was her main strength\nand her biggest appeal.%K%P
'Alright then, let's go Shuri.\nLet's do our best to become the new member!'%K%P
'Right, let's do our best.'%K%P
They were both smiling,\nbut there was a spark of tension in the air.%K%P
However, it wasn't unpleasant,\nrather it felt almost like they were enjoying it.%K%P
It's likely that because they joined up\nin the qualifier, they learned about their true\nabilities, and came to accept one another.%K%P
For some reason, that made me really happy.%K%P
'So then,\nwe need to plan for the audition, you guys!'%K%P
'Huh? Wait a minute... What do you mean 'we'?'%K%P
Shuri cocked her head in\nconfusion at Kagura's words.%K%P
'What? I mean Love☆Kami needs\nto get ready for the audition...?'%K%P
'...You still think we're\ngoing to continue as a duo?'%K%P
'Yeah, that's right.\nHm? You don't?'%K%P
'Of course I don't.\nThat was always just for the preliminaries.'%K%P
'Whaaat? No way! Let's stay together!'%K%P
'Hold on, just think for a minute!\nOnly one person can join L☆SEVEN, right?'%K%P
'So how does it make sense to compete as a duo?\nOne of us will have to lose, right?'%K%P
'Ngh...'%K%P
It was the perfect argument,\nleaving no room for a counter.%K%P
Kagura looked to me for help,\nbut all I could do was shake my head.%K%P
'Ohh...'%K%P
”So you don't want to perform\nwith me anymore, Shuri?'%K%P
'No, that's not it at all!\nBut from here on, I just want to find out\nwhat I can do on my own.'%K%P
'Otherwise, it's meaningless.'%K%P
'But...'%K%P
'It's sad, but there's no use fighting it, Kagura.'%K%P
'You understand what Shuri's saying, don't you?'%K%P
As I said this to Kagura,\nshe seemed to grow ever more unhappy.%K%P
For the time being, it was important that she\nsee for herself. There was no good in forcing her.%K%P
Of course, if I were to be honest...\nIt made me feel a little lonely, too.%K%P
'Right... I understand.'%K%P
'But, you'll still help me, won't you, Yamato?!'%K%P
Kagura slid in close to me\nas she asked.%K%P
'Yes, of course I will.\nI'm happy to do anything I can!'%K%P
'Woo-hoo! Yay, Yamato!'%K%P
At my answer,\nKagura started hopping around the room in happiness.%K%P
At any rate,\nI had already promised to help out.%K%P
'Thank you! Don't let me down, okay?'%K%P
'Whoa?!'%K%P
Shouting happily,\nKagura suddenly grabbed me in a tight embrace.%K%P
I was completely thrown by the unexpected move.\nAnd I could feel something soft\npressing up against me!%K%P
'Hehehe...'%K%P
'H-hey, Kagura!'%K%P
'Why are you turning so red?'%K%P
'Wh-What are you talking about?\nI'm not red at all!'%K%P
'Really? Your face is clearly turning bright red.\nWhat's wrong?'%K%P
Kagura asked, her face all innocent.\nWhose fault did she think it was?! How unfair!%K%P
'It's nothing, just, you can let go now.'%K%P
'Okay!'%K%P
When I said this, Kagura finally released me.%K%P
I kind of regretted it\nonce all that softness disappeared.%K%P
'So then, I guess that means Yamato will be\nhelping me out. Are you okay with that Shuri?'%K%P
'Oh, um... That's...'%K%P
'Well, I guess if Yamato says it's alright,\nthen it's whatever!'%K%P
Shuri said, glaring at me for some reason.\nSuddenly, I was very afraid...%K%P
'Is it really?'%K%P
'I said whatever, didn't I?'%K%P
'Come on, seriously, don't you want\nhim to help you out too, Shuri?'%K%P
'Why do you think I would want\nsomething like that, huh?'%K%P
'Anyway, if that's what you guys are doing,\nthen be my guest.'%K%P
'But I'll just say this one last time:\nI am not going to lose! Bye!'%K%P
After saying all of this in a rush,\nShuri turned and left the shop.%K%P
This left Kagura and I alone.%K%P
'Oh my, she just can't say what she really feels,\ncan she?'%K%P
'You think so? Maybe she's just mad because\nyou were teasing her.' %K%P
'Nope, she got upset because I hit the nail\non the head.'%K%P
Kagura puffed out her chest, full of confidence.\nHer chest being quite generous,\nbounced quite substantially as a result.%K%P
'What are you looking at? Yamato!'%K%P
'Oh, um, well...'%K%P
I suddenly noticed Kagura glaring at me.\nTrying to throw her off,\nI stuck my tongue out cutely.%K%P
'Pervert.'%K%P
'Oh, come on now, guys can't help\nbut be mesmerized by a woman's chest...'%K%P
'...I'm sorry.'%K%P
'...Pfff, bwahahaha! I shouldn't tease you so much.'%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
'You can look all you want, Yamato.'%K%P
She said, and gave me a little wink.\nWhen she did, I could feel my heart race a bit.%K%P
'St-stop messing with me.'%K%P
'What? No, I'm serious!'%K%P
'W-Well, anyway...\nI'm just happy to work with you again.'%K%P
'Same here.'%K%P
Kagura answered,\ngiving me an enormous grin.%K%P
I don't know how much good it'll do, but for her\nI'll give this audition everything I've got.%K%P
Of that, my resolution was strong.%K%P
